name: talentvis-platform
description: TalentVis recruitment platform - Admin portal and candidate PWA

scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,admin,worker -c blue,green,magenta "nodemon --ignore data/ server.js" "cd admin && npm run dev" "cd worker && npm run dev"
scripts.build: npm run build:admin && npm run build:worker
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd admin && npm install && cd ../worker && npm install

author: TalentVis
